Published to Cloud Logging/Pub/Sub; export to BigQuery/Storage. Incorporate: - Learning objectives: [PASTE FULL LIST HERE] - Scaffolding layers: [PASTE FULL LIST HERE] - Active learning ties where relevant. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards, each as: {"front": "...", "back": {"answer": "...", "explanation": "...", "bloom_level": "...", "scaffolding_layer": #, "active_learning_tie": "optional"}}.
